= !SchoolMesh =

*SchoolMesh* is an application aimed to integrate different other applications in a school, and to offer some services to teachers and students.

This wiki is here to help users on [Setup installation] and [Guide usage].

The main site for the application is [http://www.schoolmesh.mattiussilab.net/en www.schoolmesh.mattiussilab.net].

Thanks to [http://www.tuxfamily.org TuxFamily], there is also a [http://www.schoolmeshdemo.tuxfamily.org/index.php demo web site].
